name: The European Plastic Pipes and Fittings Association
memberOrga: See association website with links to the members: www.teppfa.eu
goal:
•Welcomes European plastic pipe system manufacturers whose products comply with quality and sustainability standards.

•Supports and promotes strong National Associations who in turn strengthen TEPPFA.

•Takes leadership in the public understanding of the benefits of plastic pipe systems irrespective of the plastic polymer used. (plastic polymer neutral)

•Promotes use of all plastic pipe systems in above ground building application, below ground applications (pressure and non-pressure) such as sewage, stormwater pipes and cable ducting but also distribution of gas and drinking water)

• defends its products when challenged by alternative materials.

•Takes initiatives and coordinates on environmental issues and studies to defend and promote plastic pipe applications.

•Develops Life Cycle Assessment and Environmental Product Declarations of its products in comparison with alternative materials.

•Complies with the principles and agreements of the VinylPlus Voluntary Commitment as a responsible association within society.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
